title: FOR SALE: T207 BLOCK Very Tough Card SOLD
author: tbob

posts.post_title: FOR SALE: T207 BLOCK Very Tough Card SOLD
posts.post_content:
For those who haven’t collected the T207 set, this card is almost always on every Want List in any condition. Very tough to find. This card is creased but has nice eye appeal. 
PayPal F&F is fine.
Thanks. Tbob.

Not the average chip off the ole block, Bob!

Nice card!

--
Mike
